Sytze Wopkes Wierda (28 Febụwarị 1839 na Hemrik, Netherlands ruo 10 Disemba 1911 na Sea Point, South Africa) bụ onye Dutch na-ese ụkpụrụ ụlọ na injinia nke mere ihe dị mkpa na ụkpụrụ ụlọ nke South African Republic na ngwụcha narị afọ nke 19 na mmalite senchiri nke iri abụọ.
A zụrụ Wierda dị ka ọkwá nkà tupu ọ mụọ gbasara ihe owuwu
N'ala nna ya, o tinyere aka n'iwu ụzọ ụgbọ okporo ígwè na ọrụ ọha na eze ndị ọzọ, yana imepụta ọtụtụ ụka maka Christian Reformed Church, okpukpe Protestant nke ọ bụ onye otu ya
Onye isi ala steeti Paul Kruger kpọtara ya na mba ahụ bụ onye nwere mmasị dị ukwuu n'ọrụ ya ma chọọ iguzobe ụdị ụlọ South Africa nke nwere mgbọrọgwụ Dutch
Ọrụ ya gụnyere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị na ihe owuwu dị ka post ọfịs, ụlọ ọrụ ndị uwe ojii, ụlọ mkpọrọ na àkwà mmiri
Ọtụtụ n'ime ụlọ ya dị na Pretoria ma e wezụga Rissik Street Post Office na Johannesburg
Otu n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama bụ obi ikpe ziri ezi na Church Square na Pretoria. A na-akpọ obodo South Africa Wierdapark na nsọpụrụ ya.
